assignments.name: Assign_Candidate_Record_Id_to_Variable
assignments.label: Assign Candidate Record Id to Variable

Flow.description:
**BOA** - **Flow Type:** Record-Triggered Flow - **Short:** This flow is triggered when a Candidate record is updated and the Offer_Accepted__c field is true. - **Standard:** The flow retrieves the candidate record and saves the record ID. It then checks which agency the candidate belongs to (A007 or A157) and performs different actions based on the agency. For both agencies, it sends NPR and BIG auth via DocuSign, adds tags, sends CLXP link, receives driver's license copy, pulls broker check, reviews CLXP, sends candidate summary to SM, uploads BIG auth, sends background to SM, requests additional items, sends SOE if needed via DocuSign, receives statements, asks SM for A or B contract and start date, sends CLXP A/B codes and internal C&L docs DocuSign, reviews CLXP A/B and internal Docusigns, submits CLXP to HO, sends additional HO docs, alerts SM via email, updates internal trackers, and sends staff email, ACH to Teresa, and updates supervisory central. The flow also handles No Agency case separately. - **Num Elements:** 55 - **Num Objects:** 3 (Candidate__c, ALC__c, Task) - **Objects Fields:** - (Candidate__c, Offer_Accepted__c, The flow is triggered when this field is updated and its value is true.) - (ALC__c, Created by this flow when a new record is created.) - (Task, Created by various quick actions throughout the flow to update records and send emails.)
**EOA**
Flow.label: ALC Record and Task Creation

value.stringValue: LightningFlowBuilder
AUTO_LAYOUT_CANVAS
LightningFlowBuilder
